typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	run_id as string (''),
	adf_name as string ('')
}
source(output(
		Airport_Name as string,
		Altitude as short,
		City as string,
		Country as string,
		DST as string,
		IATA as string,
		ICAO as string,
		Latitude as double,
		Longitude as double,
		Time_Zone as string,
		UTC_offset as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> ArptBlob
ArptBlob derive(ADF_RUN_ID = $run_id,
		ADF_TIME_STMP = currentTimestamp(),
		ADF_PIPLN_NAME = $adf_name,
		LAST_UPDT_DT = '1900-01-01') ~> AddADFColumns
AddADFColumns sink(input(
		ARPT_NAME as string,
		ARPT_CITY as string,
		ARPT_CNTRY as string,
		ARPT_IATA_CD as string,
		ARPT_ICAO_CD as string,
		ARPT_LAT as double,
		ARPT_LONG as double,
		ARPT_ALTD as integer,
		ARPT_UTC_OFSET as double,
		ARPT_DST as string,
		ARPT_TZONE as string,
		LAST_UPDT_DT as date,
		ADF_RUN_ID as string,
		ADF_TIME_STMP as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ARPT_NAME = Airport_Name,
		ARPT_CITY = City,
		ARPT_CNTRY = Country,
		ARPT_IATA_CD = IATA,
		ARPT_ICAO_CD = ICAO,
		ARPT_LAT = Latitude,
		ARPT_LONG = Longitude,
		ARPT_ALTD = Altitude,
		ARPT_UTC_OFSET = UTC_offset,
		ARPT_DST = DST,
		ARPT_TZONE = Time_Zone,
		LAST_UPDT_DT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> StgAirports
